mapper.select: SELECT t_user.id,t_user.address,t_user.avatar,t_user.description,t_user.email,t_user.mobile,t_user.nickname, t_user.password,t_user.sex,t_user.status,t_user.type,t_user.username,t_user.department_id,t_user.street, t_user.pass_strength,t_user.department_title,t_user.birth FROM t_user , t_user_department, t_department WHERE t_department.id = #{departmentId} and t_department.id = t_user_department.department_id and t_user.id = t_user_department.user_id
SELECT * from t_user where nickname like #{name}
